title: Dreams and Consciousness - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/2/20
itunes:title: Dreams and Consciousness - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/2/20
description:
George Noory and Dr. Edward Bruce Bynum explore his work tracking shared patterns of dreams, precognitive dreams that can predict real life events before they happen and how humans can have consciousness before they are born and after they die.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
